entries.journal_entry_completion_summary: Finally a solid lead! The speeder bikes were, in fact, destroyed by Meatlumps and their lieutenant has agreed to talk to you.
entries.journal_entry_description: Vani Korr has asked you to find a way into the Meatlump Hideout. First, you must find out where it is. To that end, you are investigating some speeder bikes that were destroyed.
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: Sul Prine, a speeder bike racer, has reported that some of his speeder bikes were destroyed. He claims that some Meatlumps are responsible. You'll find Sul at his home on Talus.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: Sul didn't see the Meatlumps attack his bikes, but he found one of their jackets. Go to their camp on Endor and find out who led the attack on Sul's bikes.
entries.task02_journal_entry_description: The Meatlumps were lead by a lieutenant named Strilath Farles. You learn that he hangs out in Doaba Guerfel. You learn that when his crew needs him, they signal him with one of the radios they have hidden throughout the city.
entries.task02_message_box_text: The Meatlumps were lead by a lieutenant named Strilath Farles. You learn that he hangs out in Doaba Guerfel. You learn that when his crew needs him, they signal him with one of the radios they have hidden throughout the city.
entries.task03_start_message: The radio sends a signal when switched on and then shuts back down.
entries.task04_journal_entry_description: Use one of the Meatlump radios in Doaba Guerfel and confront Strilath Farles.
